transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Yeah, good morning, sir.
Customer: Good morning, sir, this is [inaudible].
Executive: Ji sir, main Aryan bol raha hun IndiaMART se account manager. Apne sir matlab complaint hai sir apna koi issue aa raha hai IndiaMART se?
Customer: Haan, wo uske liye aa raha tha ki jaise sham tak me jaise humne wo search ke liye aata hai na apne kya lead by me. Yaha pe hum jaise lead by lead me kiye aur uske baad jaise hi call laga rahe the to ye error message aa gaya usme kya payment karne ke liye kehne lag gaya tha.
Executive: Payment karne ke liye kehne lag gaya tha?
Customer: Haan, 593.99. Achcha achcha achcha. To sir aapka na valid actually expire ho gayi hongi.
Customer: Valid balance na valid jo balance jo aapko daily ka milta hai ya jo aapko weekly balance hoga wo sir na abhi expire ho gaya hoga. Is vajah se sir wo keh raha hoga abhi keh na aap MDC chala rahe hain jisme aapko daily ki ek valid milti hai aur hafte me aapko 10 valid milti hain. Aapne matlab ek hi chalta hai.
Executive: Ji ji sir daily ki ek milti hai us package me sir.
Customer: Daily ka teen bata rahe the ab aap bol rahe ho daily ka ek sir.
Executive: Sir, aisa hota hai sir ki jaise Sunday aa jayega. Sunday ko raat me 12 baje aapko 10 valid mil jayengi. Thik hai jo ki aapke pure hafte rahengi wo agle Sunday ko ja ke expire hoti hain. Thik hai aur ek valid aapko daily milti hai jo ki usi same matlab night ko milegi aur night me expire ho jayegi 24 ghante baad. Aise kar ke do valid hoti hain sir aur kuch aapko sir hosting ke time mili hongi valid.
Customer: To is tarah se pehle to call bhi karte the to koi aisa nahi aata tha error message aaj kal to error message bhi aane lag gaye hain isi type ke. Shuru me kiye the ya idhar pe hum consume bhi karte the koi wo nahi. To achcha ye keh raha hai ki agar man lijiye hum 10 se jyada agar utha lete hain hai na to wo kya aage wale ek saal me minus bhi hota rahega kya jo milna hoga?
Executive: Nahi sir wo aapka sirf services ek saal ke liye hai na aapki. To aapko jo matlab weekly jo balance milta hai pehle to kya hoga ki jo aapki daily ki valid aapko daily ek mil rahi hai pehle aapka balance usme se minus hoga. Thik hai fir uske baad aapka jo weekly aapko do matlab jo 10 valid milti hain fir aapka usme se balance minus hota hai. Fir uske baad agar aap use karte hain to jo aapko hosting ke time pe valid mili hongi sir fir usme se minus hoga.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Ji ji sir aisa hota hai. Abhi sir waha pe kitna balance show kar raha hai?
Customer: Ab pata nahi ab maine wo dekha to nahi abhi to aaj ka start hi hoga aaj to use hi nahi kiye hain.
Executive: Haan haan to sir do balance do valid hongi agar sir aap badhwana chahte hain to bataiye sir usse.
Customer: Sir to badhwana chahenge to aapka rate bhi thoda high five chal raha hai.
Executive: Are sir badhiya lagwa denge abhi aapne kya isme diya hoga MDC me jitna aapne MDC me diya hoga aap do saal me jitna denge usme hi sir hum aapko badhwa ke valid aapki badhwa denge hum. Plus aapka jo package hai wo bhi aapki visibility visibility bhi kafi badh jayegi sir usme.
Customer: Nahi dekhiye direct abhi to mere paas ek hota hai ki aapki taraf se koi direct call aata hai customer ka wo bhi nahi hai.
Executive: To teen call aaye hain aapko saat din me jisme se aapne 33% matlab response rate raha hai aapka. Matlab aapne ek call sirf respond kari hai.
Customer: To wahi keh raha aur kai jagah to call bhi nahi lagta hai jaise humne receive koi buylead me jo aapka aata hai call karo to customer call hi receive nahi karta hai. Kai jagah ye bhi hote hain aur dusri baat ye aa jata hai ki cheez bhi kar liye to bolte hain ki sorry mere galti se lag gaya tha galti se wo ho gaya ab wo to mere to paise to lag rahe hain na usme bhale hi wo galti se kar raha ho ya ye kar raha ho. Aur iske baad kisi kisi ka
Executive: Sir aap ye matlab kab ki bata rahe hain sir?
Customer: Ye abhi sab ki baat hai aise hi ho raha hai. Abhi lagbhag do teen mahine se aise hi ho raha hai. Customer vagera haan. Customer vagera call karte hain to galti se lag gaya koi responsibility ka wo nahi hai to wo call thodi aata hai is type ke jaise humne lagaya tha is bahut sare cheeze rehte hain jispe kya bolte hain customer keval dal sakta hai buylead 100 ka 150 ka aur jab call karo to bolte hain ki sorry mere ko chahiye nahi tha bas check kar rahe the. To is tarah se batao wo mere kya byline me to ja raha hai na cancel to ho raha hai mere jo lead ke lagte hain usse to paise lag rahe hain agar maine receive kar liya usko to.
Executive: Ji ji. Main dekh raha hun sir abhi kya hai na sir aapne jo nau se jaise do tarikh ke baad se main dekh pa raha hun ki aap 50 jo aap buylead abhi consume kar rahe hain na wo char ghante matlab 50% ka jo ratio hai wo to aap matlab char ghante zero matlab ek zero se char ghante ke beech ki aap consume kar rahe hain aur jo 50% ki buylead hai wo aap 50% buylead aap wo wali consume kar rahe hain jo ki char ghante se 24 ghante ke beech ki hai. Matlab jo fresh aap aadhe aadhe usme matlab consume kar rahe hain aadhe aadhe buylead aap wo wali consume kar rahe hain jo ki zero se four ghante tak jo upload hui hain aadhe aap buylead wo wali use kar rahe hain jo ki zero matlab four hours to matlab uske baad ki jo hai to usme kya hota hai ki already kafi sare customers ne matlab jo sellers hain unhone unse connect kiya hua hota hai is vajah se sir wo customer aise response karte honge.
Customer: To wo main wahi keh raha hun ki agar dekho aadmi paise kya cheez ka deta hai ki ha bhai wo lead ke mere conversion matlab banenge hai na aur kam se kam baat karenge iska koi response to niklega to aise wale me to bahut sare cheeze me humne baat kiya jisme koi response hi nahi hai mere kuch kuch aise hote hain jo responsible bante hain nahi to baki to sab bekar jate hain to hum to paise usi ke de rahe hain na ki wo hamare bane aur iska to kuch to aisa hona chahiye ki kam se kam agar mere se agar baat hua hai uska to certification rahegi ki ha unse baat kiye aur mere ko response mila hai iska to aapki taraf se ye bhi to hona chahiye pata chala aapne de diya aur iske baad hamara to koi kaam hi nahi ho paya us lead se to aise lead to mere liye bekar chale gaye.
Executive: To sir us case me aap kya kariye sir jaise jo buyleads zero to four hours ke beech ki hain char ghante sir aap matlab recent buylead consume karne ki koshish kariye agar aap recent ki koi buylead consume karenge to usme aapko conversion ratio aapko jyada milega.
Customer: Wo bhi kar ke dekha hai chalo man lete hain ki jo aapka ek se 17 ghante 18 ghante jo bhi ho uske wale bhi agar hum consume kar rahe hain to thik hai wahi na bekar honge baki iske baad naye taje wale bhi aise hi haal hain. To aise nahi hota hai na koi bhi cheezon ka agar apne log business kare hue hain to uska kuch response milega tab to aadmi kuch aage sochega nahi to aise to lagega ki bekar ja rahe hain sare paise hamare. Abhi tak humne kitne logon ko call kiya sab kuch kiya fir wahi hai ki koi responsibility hai hi nahi usme aa hi nahi raha hai. Sir bahut bekar hai ye koi matlab ka nahi nikalta hai aise aise to just dial wale me hai ki ek sath unhone ke payment maine de diya hai ab unke koi wo limitation nahi hai wo kya bolte hain jab bhi koi search marta hai fatak se hamare kam se kam just dial me ja ke dekhenge roz ki kam se kam 25 wo aa jate hain lead aa jati hai bhale hi conversion nahi milta hai par lead to jarur aati hai. Sir lead aapko yaha pe bhi milti hain sir.
Customer: Are lead milti hai par aapke ek lead ke paise lagte hain na usme ek lead ke kya kai lead ek bar me kar diya unhone de diya hai pura saal bhar ka package ab jitne logon se call karna hai karte raho jitne lead aayengi aate rahe uska wo nahi rehta hai par apne ko ek ek lead ke paise dene padte hain.
Executive: Sir aapka to matlab fix hai na aapne package me liya hua hai.
Customer: Are to package me liya hai to buylead ke paise hain na aapne bata diya ki 70 call aapne uthana hai saal bhar me ab wo 70 call ke matlab kaam aaye ya na aaye wo to 70 call ke paise lag rahe hain na.
Executive: Hmm ye to hai sir.
Customer: To fir to fir wahi cheez to nuksan de raha hai na fir ya to conversion nikle ya seedhe se hai ya to usse agar mere kaam nahi hue to uske paise bhi nahi likhne chahiye to wo bhi samajh aata hai just dial me aapke sam ho ya na ho hum ek bar me payment le liye apna 15000 ab aapke paas aata rahega message message aata rahega agar unlimited unlimited connection hai kya matlab jitne chahe unlimited hai ha unlimited hai jitne log search marenge utne logon ka aata rahega mere paas.
Executive: Achcha to sir jaise wo log jab aap pe search marte honge to unke calls aap pe aate rehte honge.
Customer: Call aate hain message aate hain to aisa aisa bhi sir IndiaMART me bhi aise hi hai jo log aap se direct connect karte hain wo unka se directly hai na wo to call karenge aap agar direct are sir direct aapke kitne aate hain ye bataiye ye bahut hua to kam se kam mere khyal se is sapte ya dedh sapte me ek aadh koi direct call kiya call kiya is tarah ke hai na to itna to aata nahi hai usse jyada to logon ke paas chale jate hain.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To main wahi keh raha hun ye cheeze hain aur hum call karne ke liye jo mere paas buylead aate hain uske aapke yaha charge lag jate hain aur usme kai sahi conversion hote hain kai log nahi hote hain conversion wale to abhi is mahine me hum bataye keval is sapte ke andar ek hi mera ho paya hai ab socho to ek sapte me maine kitna paisa payment kar diya aur aaya mere paas kitna matlab abhi mere paas teen ek kis kis ka aa raha hai keval mantra aur iska morpho wala aa raha hai aur Sikh vision ka yahi mere kaam ke aa rahe hain aur baki koi kaam ke nahi hain.
Executive: Achcha to sir main abhi ek bar aap matlab system apna dekhe kholenge jara mere ko bataiye sir kaun si lead aapke kaam ki nahi hai.
Customer: Chaliye ek minute is samay ke mobile me hum direct mobile pe kar rahe hain mobile pe khol lijiye sir koi issue nahi hai mobile pe khol lijiye aap. Chaliye ek minute. Mobile pe kholte hain. Ye bas thik hai kya baat achcha bhi lagta hai ki kai sare customer hote hain jo kya bolte hain direct payment kar dete hain hai na par kai sare customer aise hote hain jo bolte hain ki nahi bhaiya pahunchne ke baad unko bhi response de rahe hain koi baat nahi baki ye hai ki bahut sare bas aise feku type ke aa jate hain message. Aur treadmill vagera agar hum karte hain to treadmill walon me bolte hain kai sare customer ki nahi hum direct ghar se nahi mere yaha honge to bataiye matlab ab hum uski yaha sab batane jaye are bahut sare ab kya kya bataya aap kya kam se kam aisa hona chahiye ki direct customer hum log se pucha jaye ki ha ye aa wala lead aapke kaam me aaya ki nahi aaya agar nahi aaya to wo minus jora na jaye to samajh aata hai.
Executive: Sir aap ek baat bataiye dukan me man lo agar char log grahak aate hain aapke paas to kya charo saman thodi na kharid ke jate honge. Kuch to rate puch ke chale jate honge sir. Ji puch ke bataiye. Main yahi keh raha hun ki charo nahi jaye agar aapke paas humne 10 lead pure sapte bhar me consume kiya thik hai to kam se kam teen se char aise hone chahiye jo aaye aur kai bar to aisa sapte sapte consume jata jo hote hi nahi hain. To ye kya matlab hua to hum to usi liye de rahe hain na. Aisa thodi hai. Aap sir mere ko bataiye matlab jo aapki lead irrelevant hai jo matlab aapke kaam ki nahi hai mere ko wo bata dijiye aap. Batate hain. Ye jaise ki main ek hai daily ka isme buylead me jayenge lead manager me isme lead manager me dekhiye Amir Hussain ka hai hai na lead manager me se ya fir buyleads me?
Customer: Lead manager kyuki humne unse baat kiya hua hai na lead manager me hi aayega na sir. Achcha. Haan to sir achcha jaise sir wo aap bata rahe hain aapke kaam ki nahi hai to usme sir na ek wo matlab ek thumbs up aur thumbs down kar ke aa raha hoga to waha pe likha hota hai ki ye matlab relevant hai ya not relevant hai to waha pe sir aapne not relevant mark kiya hai sir usme? To aap bataoge tab na ab hume kya pata ki isme kya hai not relevant se kaisa hai waha pe sir usko training me aapko ye bhi nahi bataya ki mere kaam ka nahi hai to uske liye kuch kar bhi sakte hain. Ji ji aap sir usme na not relevant mark kar dijiye to aage se na us tarike ki aapko lead nahi dikhaya karega. Kaha pe hai? Waha pe hai sir option usi me sir buylead me agar aap open karenge to buylead me aapne dekha jo aap naam bata rahe hain usko usme dekhenge na to usme chat me aapko dikhega. Aaj ka review hai writing view hai save reply hai mark chat ye sab to kuch bhi nahi hai. Sir jo chat hai na aapka chat jaha pe aapki chat show ho rahi hai wahi pe sir ye show karta hai. Ye buylead me jana hai kya? Haan buylead me jayenge nahi sir lead manager me aap jayenge jiski aap baat kar rahe hain ki ye matlab aapke kaam wo nahi tha to usme sir ja ke not relevant mark karna hai aapko. Agar sir koi matlab issue aa raha hai to main aap na mere ko option aa raha hai. Aisa to koi option hi nahi dikh raha hai isme. Main sir abhi batata hun aapko ye kaha kaise abhi sir screen share matlab video meeting pe aap aa sakte hain? Ek minute paanch minute baad aate hain office ki saf safai kar lijiye. Achcha achcha to sir aap na paanch matlab jab aap thik hai call back karte hain. Hello. Haan call back karte hain aapko. Okay sir okay okay. Hello sir. Haan ji bataiye. Hello ji sir aap na mera number likh lo 8077 ye jo mere ko pehle manager diya gaya tha wo hat gaye kya? Ji ji abhi kya hoga na sir ho sakta hai unka promotion ho gaya ho ya transfer ho gaya ho to sir abhi aapka na case mere paas aa gaya hai to aap na mera number likh lo aapko agar koi bhi issue hota hai to aap mere se connect kariyega 8077 8077 nahi 8077 8077 5206 520677

[silence]

Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai kripya line par bane rahe.


Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Ji aaya koi aaya? Ji ji ji sir aapka call aaya tha mere paas. Main ye keh raha hun sir abhi aapke jo ticket aaya hua tha matlab jo complaint aayi hui thi us pe sir abhi main matlab revert kar raha hun thik hai to aapke paas ek feedback ka option aayega. Thik hai sir? Ye close to ho gaya pehle aap to kar lo uske bilkul sir abhi abhi sir close kar dete hain koi issue nahi hai is cheez me video meet pe ab connect karte hain. Thik hai? Chaliye thik hai 10 minute baad karte hain. Okay sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to use buyleads; payment error occurring.

- Feels that many leads are not useful.

- Wants a refund for non-performing leads.

- Direct calls from customers are not received.



Resolution:

- Explained the daily and weekly buylead system.

- Explained how balance is deducted from account.

- Executive offered to increase the buylead limit.

- Executive explained how to mark leads as irrelevant.

- Executive shared his contact number.

- Executive will revert on the ticket raised.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after 5 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, irrelevant leads
